YOU_MAKE_AN_IMPACT_WHILE_YOU_EARN: You Make An Impact While You Earn.
CLICK_TO_OWN_EFOREST_SEED_NOW: Click to Own eForest Seeds Now
DEFORESTATION_REFER: Deforestation refers to the cutting, logging or clearing of trees in a forest.
DEFORESTATION_KILLS: Deforestation kills wildlife, destroys habitats, and increases climate change.
WE_MUST_PROTECT: We must protect our forests to save our earth. We can do this by planting more trees and switching to clean energy.
DEFORESTATION_CAUSES_DEVASTATION: Deforestation causes devastation to the climate, economy, community and environment.
EFOREST_WOULD_LIKE_TO: eFOREST would like to offer solutions to these issues.
EFOREST_HELP_THROUGH_PLANTING: eFOREST helps through planting more trees. Everytime you buy a seed package a real tree will be planted as well. eForest also pledges a percentage of our earnings to NGOs who are active in environmental protection.
THE_BIGGEST_GLOBAL_ECONOMIC: The biggest global economic issue is inflation. The impact of inflation is the continuous increase of costs of living. eFOREST is world’s first “Play-To-Earn” game with a Deflationary Average Daily 0.3% growth that offers up to 300% your initial seeds
IT_TAKES_A_VILLAGE_TO: It takes a village to raise a forest and the forest will reward the community in ten folds. Planting more trees will help to curb lack of natural resources and boost economic growth for impoverished communities.
EVERY_TREE_HAS_A_STORY: Every tree has a story and you can create your own journey story with eFOREST. Buy a seed package from eFOREST and it will include donations of tree saplings and tree seeds to our partners.
WE_HAVE_THE_CAPABILITIES: We have the capabilities to restore the Earth and its forests. By becoming a donor or part of the eForest community, you are adding roots to the soil that will flourish and nourish the Earth.
WE_WANT_TO_EXPERIENCE: We want to experience a long-term positive impact with EARTH Tree. It may not be on the blockchain but you know you will have contributed towards the health and restoration of the environment. Saving the Earth will Save Lives.
THIS_LOVE_TREE_INITIATIVE: This LOVE Tree initiative will take place in the more destitute communities in India. When you buy a seed package, a fruit tree sapling will be planted by a farmer. For the farmer, the tree represents hope and a better future.
THESE_TREES_OF_WEALTH: These Trees of Wealth will also be listed in the blockchain and you can have access to its information and keep track of its growth.
YOUR_TREES_ARE_ALSO_ON: Your trees are also on the blockchain
COMPLETE_THE_TASK_IN_THE_GAME: Complete the tasks in the game and you can buy, sell and trade seeds with others. Place orders for seeds and watch your deposits grow! eFOREST's 'Play-To-Earn' game is based on the Deflationary Average Daily 0.3% growth that offers up to 300% your initial seeds
SEND_AN_EFOREST_TREE_GIFT: Send an eFOREST tree gift for your loved ones or a close friend. Any occassion is a good time to plant a tree!
BROUGHT_TO_YOU_BY_EFOREST: Brought to you by eFOREST. BE HUNGRY TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE. It’s time to step into your greatness so that you can make an impact in YOUR LIFE and in THIS WORLD.
JOIN_OUR_BUDDY_REFERRAL_PROGRAM_FOR_ACTI: Join our Buddy Referral Program for Active and Passive Earning.
PERSONALLY_REFER_AT_LEAST: 1. Personally refer at least 5 active Players who purchase a Seed Package.
YOUR_TEAM_BONUS_PERCENTAGE: 2. Your Team Bonus percentage will be based on the package you purchased.
GET_THE_LATEST_NEWS: Get the latest news, updates, and access to pre-release content.
WATER_YOUR_SEEDS_TO: 3. Water your seeds to germinate into trees
WAIT_30_DAYS_FOR: 4. Wait 30 days for trees to harvest more seeds
SELL_REPLANT: 5. Sell, re-plant or accelerate the release of seeds

SEED_HOVER: To store received seeds from Direct Referrals and Team Bonus. Seeds Wallet also can be used for buy and sell, replanting and receiving Harvested seeds from Basket.
TEMP_SEED_HOVER: To collect seeds from watering or Acceleration. Seeds in Basket can be Harvested (withdrawn) into Seed Wallet for selling in P2P or replanting.
PARTNER_TITLE_1: LOVE Tree and EARTH Tree Story
EARTH_TREE_PARTNER_DESC_1: Land which was once lush with greenery has been deforested making it barren and causing the extinction of wildlife. Along with man, wildfires and other disasters have killed the very thing forests need to thrive.....trees. Trees are a precious resource. Trees are woven into the very fabric of our ecosystems and are essential to the continued existence of all life on our precious earth - even our own!
EARTH_TREE_PARTNER_DESC_2: Unfortunately, it is exceedingly difficult sourcing for trees to restore the deforested land. That’s where the work of eFOREST and our Partner come into play. Together we reforest the land and give the community a sense of ownership to protect their forests for a greener future.
EARTH_TREE_PARTNER_DESC_3: Our aim is to plant thousands of EARTH Trees every month. At the same time we are creating jobs for people within the community facing immeasurable economic and political challenges.
EARTH_TREE_PARTNER_DESC_4: eFOREST EARTH Tree is a global initiative aiming to restore, reclaim and rebirth the land to create positive outcomes for wildlife, people and the earth’s ecosystem. The tree seeds donated will be germinated into seedlings and then distributed to where it is needed most in various types and species, suited to the individual climates and land requirements to fight the devastation of deforestation and once more.....rehabilitate the land to its full glory.
PARTNER_BUYNOW_1: Buy an eFOREST Seed package and we will plant more LOVE Trees.
LOVE_TREE_PARTNER_DESC_1: A farmer with sweat on his brow, thin slippers on his feet and a few tools in his bag trudged through the clear valley holding something very precious in his hands. A tree sapling. He is cradling it like a child of his own. He made his way through the land till he came to the chosen spot.
LOVE_TREE_PARTNER_DESC_2: With the small, worn out hoe, he dug a hole in the Earth. He gently laid the sapling to the ground and using his bare hands, scraped the remaining earth to cover the precious roots. He gazed at the sapling saying a little prayer that it will grow healthy and strong. He prays that the fruits will be abundant so he can harvest and sell them in the market to feed his family and send his children to school. He can buy medicine for his ailing mother and some new clothes for his wife.
LOVE_TREE_PARTNER_DESC_3: The farmer picked up his tools and walked back home with a lighter heart, because today he has planted yet another hope for a better future. Better for the environment and for his children.
LOVE_TREE_PARTNER_DESC_4: We call this the eFOREST LOVE Tree. The LOVE Tree initiative is beyond planting trees to save the Earth but also to uplift communities in need. We provide fruit tree saplings for the farmers to plant. Rural communities in India will be able to be self-sustaining and self-sufficient. Each sapling means more than just ecological diversity, it means giving rural farmers a better life. The community through means of agricultural cultivation and education will not only just survive, it will also thrive.
LOVE_TREE_PARTNER_DESC_5: Once the tree bears fruits, it will be harvested as a food source and it is also a means of earning some income for the farmer. It is truly a gift that continues giving. You will be able to see the progress of each LOVE Tree as recorded in the blockchain. You may access the species and information and the name of the farmer given the privilege to plant your tree sapling. You may even pay a visit to your tree if you so desire.
